questionText: When this tower opened in 1889 it was the tallest building in the world
This buiding was the tallest freestanding structure in the world from when it was completed in 1975 until 2009.
This volcano is the highest peak in Japan
The first person to go over this natural feature in a barrel was Annie Edson Taylor in 1901.
This is the only one of the seven wonders of the ancient world that remains standing.
